review: Bought this on Prime day for an excellent price. Flawless for what I was looking for. I have a Roku player but needed a stick for traveling and this is THE one to get. Now I use it more often than the chromecast at home too.First it connects in hotels where virtually every other non smartphone/computer/tablet would have a problem getting by the splash screen where you have to agree to terms.Second, it will miracast everything with no problem. The Fire Stick has a slingplayer app but it only works with the newer slingboxes. No problem, I can send the slingplayer showing on my device to the TV and watch on the big screen. If at home you may have other ways of doing this wirelessly, but for traveling this is the best option.Third, watching anything from Prime (or playing music) simply works, great picture and again anywhere you have Wifi and a TV.While the Amazon App store may not have a ton of apps for it, in general android apps will work on it. There are apps that will put almost any Android app on the stick, not all may work correctly.
